post_detail.description:
What this case study demonstrates: 
Our ability to film 10 high-quality instructional videos with an edgy high fashion-editorial look in 2 days. 

Background: 
Click 3X created 10 consumer facing how-to videos for Estee Lauder. 

Execution: 
We filmed top beauty models showing how to use products, which were featured in Estee Lauderâ€™s holiday promotional package. The videos also had to be shot and edited in a way to make versioning and translating seamless for non English speaking countries.
post_detail.title: Estee Lauder
